chapters.title: Chapter 19: Memories
chapters.info: Lady Ellorien Traemane, p. 354 (251)—Andoran lady, leader of a strong House that supported Morgase during the Succession, and one of Morgase's best friends. Morgase exiled her from Caemlyn as per Gaebril's suggestion; when Ellorien demanded to know why, Morgase had her flogged. Elayne was named after her grandmother.
